job_tasks.phrase: create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and guidance of models for avatar behavior.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development, maintenance, and deployment of models and algorithms.

job_tasks.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of modifying existing models or solutions for a specific use case.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on writing production-grade software.

job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of software libraries to improve the development workflow.
CI/CD integration is a core software development practice for deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment
job_tasks.justification: This phrase covers the entire lifecycle of an ML model, which is central to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development practices focused on code quality and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the creation and adherence to good coding practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on the practical aspect of making prototypes functional for deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of production software and full-stack capabilities to deliver to product.

job_tasks.phrase: create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ultimate business goal and product vision of the role.

job_tasks.phrase: working at the heart of the dynamic Avatar Video Team helping with the research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the context of the work within a specific team and its focus on generative avatar performance.

soft_skills.phrase: take ownership of the full ML lifecycle
take ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
passion for working on cutting edge problems

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of generative models for 'synthetic humans through text-to-video' and 'avatar performance abilities'. It specifically mentions creating models that guide avatar cues, adapting solutions, and a focus on the full ML lifecycle, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
